comment.body: It seems to be hard, if not impossible, to find any legitimate domains hosted on that `5.61.60.0/24` range, so I propose `5.61.60.*$network`, which I at least think should work on AdGuard for Android.

I use Sophos Home. AdGuard is otherwise working fine, except on this page.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://lookmovie.foundation/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flookmovie.foundation%2F) ### Comment > Pop up banner seen on Chrome for Android. ### Screenshots

https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js

comment.body:
The banner is hidden on the domain: lookmovie.foundation
However, this domain redirects to other domains for loading the actual media content (movie player pages).
For example, when you click on any movie thumbnail image, it will redirect from lookmovie.foundation to some other temporary domain.
Therefore, a generic rule is needed that will work on any domain and not just with lookmovie.foundation
